casebody.data:
In re Theodore S. ROYSTER, Jr. No. 608A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 12, 2007. Paul R. Ross, Chairman, James J. Coman, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for Judicial Standards Commission. J. Calvin Cunningham, Lexington, Nicholas D. Wilson, for Royster.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of January 2007 by Other for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Judicial Standards Commission shall have up to and including the 15th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of January 2007."
